name: 固態物理（一）
goals: Understand important theories and experiments of solid state physics
Introduction to new developments in solid state physics
syllabus:
Part I: Structure

  chapter 1: Crystal and lattice

  chapter 2: Phonon

Part II: Electronic properties

  chapter 3: Drude model

  chapter 4: Sommerfeld theory

  chapter 5: Landau theory

  chapter 6: Band theory

  chapter 7: Quantum Hall effect

  chapter 8: Superconductivity

  chapter 9: Semiconductor

  chapter 10: Magnetic ordering
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
